// DO NOT EDIT - This file is generated from your InstantDB schema.
// Any changes will be overwritten on the next codegen run.

import Foundation
import InstantDB
import IdentifiedCollections
import SharingInstant

// MARK: - Schema Namespace

/// Type-safe schema namespace with auto-derived SharedKeys.
///
/// Use these static properties to create type-safe queries:
///
/// ```swift
/// // Basic sync
/// @Shared(Schema.members)
/// private var items: IdentifiedArrayOf<Member> = []
///
/// // With ordering
/// @Shared(Schema.members.orderBy(\.name, .desc))
/// private var items: IdentifiedArrayOf<Member> = []
/// ```
public enum Schema {
  /// Member entity - bidirectional sync
  ///
  /// A library member who can borrow books.
  /// Members have a unique email address and can:
  /// - Borrow multiple books at once
  /// - Have a favorite author
  /// - Express interest in multiple genres
  /// @example
  /// ```typescript
  /// const member = {
  /// id: "mem_123",
  /// name: "Jane Doe",
  /// email: "jane@example.com"
  /// };
  /// ```
  public static let members = EntityKey<Member>(namespace: "members")

  /// Author entity - bidirectional sync
  ///
  /// An author who writes books.
  /// Authors can write multiple books and have fans.
  public static let authors = EntityKey<Author>(namespace: "authors")

  /// Book entity - bidirectional sync
  ///
  /// A book in the library catalog.
  /// ## ISBN Format
  /// We support both ISBN-10 and ISBN-13 formats.
  /// Store without hyphens for consistency.
  public static let books = EntityKey<Book>(namespace: "books")

  /// Genre entity - bidirectional sync
  ///
  /// A book genre/category.
  public static let genres = EntityKey<Genre>(namespace: "genres")

  /// BorrowRecord entity - bidirectional sync
  ///
  /// A record of a book being borrowed.
  public static let borrowRecords = EntityKey<BorrowRecord>(namespace: "borrowRecords")

}
